      • Explosion

        public Explosion(Position position,
                 SpriteSheet sprite)
        This constructor sets the explosion duration with its default value. The duration default value is define by the constant DEFAUL_DURATION.
        Parameters:
        position - Explosion position in screen
        sprite - Explosion sprite
